channel.title: A lil help plz
channel.description:
if any one can point me in the right direction on how to throw this up so i can play around with it and learn ill be very grateful :) its the kingpk source not trying to run it just trying to learn thx
http://www.mediafire.com/?933ffp8fikcwzz5

item.title: A lil help plz
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:2, topic:446953”]All you need to do with that source is setup xammp, go into phpmyadmin and create a database called rscd, then at the top import, select file and select the rscd.sql file…

KINGPK.7z - 9.4 MB - Edited to run on local host with no sql password and default user of root… run the ls server and then the server, then run the client…

You don’t need a forum to test it out, just use user: open admin password: open1…

Done…[/quote]
thank you very much kind sir

Read full topic

item.title: A lil help plz
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

All you need to do with that source is setup xammp, go into phpmyadmin and create a database called rscd, then at the top import, select file and select the rscd.sql file…

KINGPK.7z - 9.4 MB - Edited to run on local host with no sql password and default user of root… run the ls server and then the server, then run the client…

You don’t need a forum to test it out, just use user: open admin password: open1…

Done…

Read full topic

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.
